name: Galactic Double Dutch VR
description:
This project is a fun way to get physical in VR and have a positive experience that takes the player back to childhood jump rope games. We are excited to create an experience that is fun, funny, and that offers positive affirmations even when the player makes a mistake. 

Consider the possibility that in a 1,000 years in the future people are using lasers, not ropes.
